sections.name: summary
sections.title: Summary
sections.text: Thoughtful and detail-oriented MBA-IS graduate with eighteen years of experience in full stack web development seeking a position to create value and achieve organizational goals through problem solving, resource alignment, planning, execution, and analysis.

items.title: 3.7 Designs, LLC
items.blurb: Wordpress Development, Content Management Strategy, Operations
highlights: Developed repeatable custom blocks and led transition from traditional Wordpress templating to streamline and reduce time spent on content management and quality assurance.
Worked with cross functional teams in a fast-paced environment to facilitate business operations and client workflows with newly learned technologies.
Defined and analyzed business segment values, client portfolio values, and customer risk assessments.

items.title: Continuing Education
highlights: Applied, studied, and passed GMAT within 2-week preparation window.
Planned and provisioned financial resources and tuition.
Received nomination to attend Advanced Leadership Academy seminars and scored in the 97th percentile on the business capstone.

items.title: AVATAR, LLC
highlights: Designed and developed content management data solutions and created systems to manage complex and specialized CMS data.
Coordinated repeatable e-commerce plugin integrating a catalog data solution provider with a shopping cart system.
Provided enhanced support and training to new employees, managers, and clients while coordinating six to ten projects per month.

items.title: Beyond Gaming, LLC
highlights: Maintained, optimized, and implemented a 31% reduction in CSS without altering website presentation or experience.
Created website graphics and featured material for national video game tournaments including Ubisoftâ€™s ShootMania, TrackMania, and Rayman Legends.
Designed and coded MVC views and HTML email templates for match notifications, challenges, and schedules.
